WorkItem.ClosedComment: Not a bug. That screen is showing the changes to make.
WorkItem.Description:
After loading my character and choosing all enchants I choose the optimize option. After it finishes optimizing and gives you the overview of items it randomly doesn't show all of the previously equipped items. In the example screen shot that I'm attaching you can see this time it didn't include the shoulders.
 
Steps to reproduce:
1) Load character from battle.net | Stonemaul/Wakenbake
2) Choose any missing enchants
3) Choose Tools>Optimizer
4) Click the Optimize button
After this point it seems to no include some items randomly.
 
Additional Info:
Rawr 4.0.17.0b
WinXP SP3 (Also happens on my Win7 ultimate box)
 
Attached:
Screen shot of shoulder armor missing on optimize overview
WorkItem.Summary: Optimizer - Items do not show up randomly after using the optimize option

Comments.Message: Well then I appologize for wasting your time. Sorry about that. =/
